sql.query:
SELECT tt_aeps_trans.id, tt_aeps_trans.user_id, tt_aeps_trans.user_rt_id, tt_aeps_trans.merchant_id, tt_aeps_trans.amount, tt_aeps_trans.op_bal, tt_aeps_trans.comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.charge_amt, tt_aeps_trans.net_amt, tt_aeps_trans.closing_bal, tt_aeps_trans.tr_mode, tt_aeps_trans.tr_type, tt_aeps_trans.status, tt_aeps_trans.tr_id, tt_aeps_trans.reason, tt_aeps_trans.api_logs AS api_name, tt_aeps_trans.is_processed, tt_aeps_trans.operator_ref, tt_aeps_trans.api_ref, tt_aeps_trans.api_response_time, tt_aeps_trans.process_mode, tt_aeps_trans.live, tt_aeps_trans.tr_date, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_amount, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_amt, tt_aeps_trans.bank_name, tt_aeps_trans.service_api, tt_aeps_trans.updated_on, tt_aeps_trans.api_tnx_date, tt_aeps_trans.bank_acno, tt_aeps_trans.benef_name, tt_aeps_trans.benef_id, tt_aeps_trans.aeps_number, m_op.operator_name, service.service_name, mu.user_fname, mu.user_mobile, mu_parent.user_id AS parent_id, mu_parent.user_fname AS parent_name, mu_parent.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, tt_aeps_trans.ip_address
FROM tt_aeps_trans
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_aeps_trans.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS service ON (service.id = tt_aeps_trans.service_id) LEFT JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_aeps_trans.user_id) LEFT JOIN m_users AS mu_parent ON (mu_parent.id = tt_aeps_trans.trans_by)
WHERE tt_aeps_trans.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate}} */
ORDER BY tt_aeps_trans.id DESC

SELECT tt_aeps_trans.id, tt_aeps_trans.user_id, tt_aeps_trans.user_rt_id, tt_aeps_trans.merchant_id, tt_aeps_trans.amount, tt_aeps_trans.op_bal, tt_aeps_trans.comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.charge_amt, tt_aeps_trans.net_amt, tt_aeps_trans.closing_bal, tt_aeps_trans.tr_mode, tt_aeps_trans.tr_type, tt_aeps_trans.status, tt_aeps_trans.tr_id, tt_aeps_trans.reason, tt_aeps_trans.api_logs AS api_name, tt_aeps_trans.is_processed, tt_aeps_trans.operator_ref, tt_aeps_trans.api_ref, tt_aeps_trans.api_response_time, tt_aeps_trans.process_mode, tt_aeps_trans.live, tt_aeps_trans.tr_date, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.dt_comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.dt_charge_amount, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_per, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_val, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_comm_amt, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_per, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_val, tt_aeps_trans.mdt_charge_amt, tt_aeps_trans.bank_name, tt_aeps_trans.updated_on, tt_aeps_trans.service_api, tt_aeps_trans.api_tnx_date, tt_aeps_trans.bank_acno, tt_aeps_trans.benef_name, tt_aeps_trans.benef_id, tt_aeps_trans.aeps_number, m_op.operator_name, service.service_name, mu.user_fname, mu.user_mobile, mu_parent.user_id AS parent_id, mu_parent.user_fname AS parent_name, mu_parent.user_mobile AS parent_mobile, tt_aeps_trans.ip_address
FROM tt_aeps_trans
LEFT JOIN m_operator AS m_op ON (m_op.id = tt_aeps_trans.op_id) LEFT JOIN m_service AS service ON (service.id = tt_aeps_trans.service_id) LEFT JOIN m_users AS mu ON (mu.id = tt_aeps_trans.user_id) LEFT JOIN m_users AS mu_parent ON (mu_parent.id = tt_aeps_trans.trans_by)
WHERE tt_aeps_trans.tr_date BETWEEN :P1 /* {{$_GET.fromdate}} */ AND :P2 /* {{$_GET.todate}} */ AND tt_aeps_trans.status = :P3 /* {{$_GET.selectstatus}} */
ORDER BY tt_aeps_trans.id DESC
